attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Do not download this app! Full of glitches, malfunctions, and bugs. Kept crashing my phone. Also... BLACK LIVES MATTER.

attributes.title: just delete it bruh
attributes.review: i just don’t like trump at all. he DISGUSTS ME. he’s so old and racist and creepy and sexist and ugh just everything negative HIS OWN FAMILY IS WEIRDED OUT BY HIM I CANT TAKE IT ANYMORE I HATE HIM. he needs to be impeached now! held accountable for the actions he’s made 🙄. anyways save #barron trump 2020

attributes.title: CHEETO BLOB
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a Cheeto blob and he is very frightening so please take down the app I don’t want to see food and creatures on the app!! This is very very disrespectful and disturbing and rude! I can’t believe I seen his small shrimp my eyes are popping out and my mom is now horrified because my eyes are popping out!! This is not okay I repeat not okay!!

attributes.title: This app is a no no DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE! WASTED OF SAPCE!  DONT DOWNLOAD IT. This app doesn’t even function right. It’s not worth downloading. I say don’t even open the app. You’ll see horrible things. It took 2 months to download. I had a lot of free space on my phone. I’m not one of those people who just want it taken down. I’m not a trump supporter, but I was interested in what this man was talking about. The app is honestly not worth the download. Made no sense what so ever. ❤️

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Imagine being sexist and racist. What a clown

attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever seen in my life and that’s saying something I can’t believe we still have a person like trump as our president

attributes.title: The app crashes my phone
attributes.review: The app has been crashing my phone like if I am in a important call it crashes

attributes.title: Delete it
attributes.review: There’s no other way to say this but this app just sucks😪
